about_the_game:
Blaster Boy 2d shooter boss gauntlet. Players will Blast their way through a variety of bosses while completing challenges to unlock new playable characters, more game modes and other in-game content.

Blaster Boy captures the old school retro and nostalgic feel of 2d shooters in the 1980's-1990's as well as the gameplay mechanics that are simple and easy to learn but hard to master.

Play as Blaster Boy or Blaster Girl (in single player or local co-op) as you move from boss fight to boss fight in adventure mode, unlocking secret playable character boss fights. Players can also try tackling Gauntlet Mode facing bosses back to back retaining your health to get high scores and time records. All while still trying to complete challenges to unlock more game modes and more playable characters!
